security: Disclosing that the CIA tracks U.S. citizens based on derogatory information from foreign governments could be controversial. Directly quoting the document: "U.S. CITIZEN ON WHOM PANAMANIAN DEPT OF NATIONAL INVESTIGATIONS HAS DEROGATORY INFO."
summary: A document cross-referencing file information on Edward Crowder, Jr., a U.S. citizen, noting that the Panamanian Department of National Investigations possesses derogatory information about him.
summary_one_paragraph: This is a document transfer and cross-reference form concerning Edward Crowder, Jr., a U.S. citizen, indexed under file number 201-059919. The document indicates that the Panamanian Department of National Investigations holds derogatory information about Crowder. It instructs that the document be returned to the CIA for background use only and not to be reproduced, emphasizing the sensitivity of the information.
title: Document Transfer and Cross Reference: Edward Crowder, Jr.
